plugin-data.name: Show Node - Pi Lab
plugin-data.description:
This plugin allows you to specify names for each IP in a webserver cluster.

This was built specifically for Pi Lab, but can be used with any Bludit installation on a server cluster.

add-node-tip: This is what will display when viewing this node.
ip-tip: This is the IP of the node.
dev-port-tip: This is the port for the 'dev' node. For example: devnode.com:8000
dev-name-tip: This is what will display when viewing your 'dev' node.
